name: allow_ACE Node in Desk Preference
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Hardware Design Selection_ ACE_Node,Node Supplier_ACE1,Trusted Platform Module_TPM_ACE_desk,Additional Hard Disk ACE desk pre,Optional DVDACE desk pre,Displays_ace_desk_pre,Display Size _ACE_desk_pre,Display Supplier (ACE),Trackball (ACE),ServerLocationClusterNetwork_Group desk,ACE Node in Desk Preference)*><*SETREQUIRED(Hardware Design Selection_ ACE_Node,Node Supplier_ACE1,Trusted Platform Module_TPM_ACE_desk,Additional Hard Disk ACE desk pre,Optional DVDACE desk pre,Displays_ace_desk_pre,Display Size _ACE_desk_pre,Display Supplier (ACE),Trackball (ACE),ServerLocationClusterNetwork_Group desk,ACE Node in Desk Preference)*>
<*xDisallowallValuesExcept(ServerLocationClusterNetwork_Group desk:<* LIST ( SELECT AttValue FROM 
ClusterAttValues WHERE CAST (AttValueCode AS float) 
<= '<*CTX( Container(List of Locations/Clusters/Network Groups).Rows.GetCount )*>' ) *>)*>
[IF]([IN](<*VALUE(Interface with TPS Required?)*>,Yes,No,)){<*SETOPTIONAL(Additional Memory ACE_desk_pre)*><*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(Additional Memory ACE_desk_pre)*>}{<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Additional Memory ACE_desk_pre)*><*SETREQUIRED(Additional Memory ACE_desk_pre)*>}[ENDIF]
